original_title: Govt. committed to prevent injustice towards ‘Aswesuma’ beneficiaries – President’s Office
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) -Samurdhi beneficiaries will receive their allowance for June 2023.
The Aswesuma welfare benefit program is set to be implemented in July, Director General of the Department of Samurdhi Development Bandula Thilakasiri said.
The time period granted for families who were not included in the Aswesuma welfare benefit program to submit appeals, has been extended till July 10.
A special hotline was also introduced to obtain information for appeals of people who have lost welfare benefits under the Aswesuma program.
The information can be obtained via the hotline 1924, between 08 am and 05 pm from Monday to Friday.
The President's Office also assured that any shortcomings in the process of selecting the relevant candidates will be rectified immediately.
Plans are underway to discuss this with the district secretaries, divisional secretaries, and other parties involved in the program.
